text: Target: My cat died, and I feel very sad about it.
Observer: Oh my gosh, I'm so sorry to hear that. When my cat died it really affected me, too.
Target: I just can't beat the third level of Super Mario Brothers and it's totally ruining my day.
Observer: Ugh yeah, that's so frustrating.
Target: I finally got promoted after five years of working here! I've been putting in extra hours and it feels like all my hard work is being recognized.
Observer: That's wonderful news! You must feel so proud and validated after all that dedication. Congratulations!
Target: My best friend just moved across the country and I feel so lonely without her. We used to do everything together.
Observer: Well, at least you can still video chat. It's not that big of a deal.
Target: I'm really nervous about my job interview tomorrow. It's my dream company and I'm terrified I'll mess it up.
Observer: I totally understand that feeling. The anticipation before something so important can be overwhelming. I'm sure you've prepared well though.
Target: My doctor just told me I need surgery next month. I'm scared about going under anesthesia and the recovery process.
Observer: My cousin had surgery once. Anyway, what are you doing this weekend?
Target: I just found out I didn't get into any of the graduate programs I applied to. I feel like such a failure after all that preparation.
Observer: That must be incredibly disappointing after putting so much effort into your applications. Rejection like that can really shake your confidence. How are you holding up?
Target: My partner surprised me with a weekend getaway for our anniversary! I'm so touched that they remembered how much I wanted to visit that place.
Observer: Oh nice. Where are you going?
Target: I've been struggling with insomnia for weeks and it's affecting my work and relationships. I feel exhausted all the time.
Observer: That sounds really draining. Sleep deprivation can impact every part of your life. Have you been able to talk to anyone about what might be causing it?
Target: I just ran my first marathon! My legs are killing me but I can't believe I actually finished it.
Observer: Wow, that's an amazing accomplishment! The pain must be worth it knowing you pushed through and achieved something so challenging. You should be really proud of yourself!
